property.name: Text
property.value: You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to engage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Engage. Choose an enemy up to 2 locations away. Move (one location at a time) to that enemy’s location, engage it, and add [Bless] tokens to the chaos bag equal to that enemy’s horror value.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent. Limit 1 Covenant per deck. ι After an investigator at any location performs the “reveal chaos token” step of a skill test, exhaust Sacred Covenant: Return any number of [Bless] tokens revealed during this test to the chaos bag, ignoring their modifiers for this test.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (3 secrets). θ Exhaust Eldritch Sophist: Move 1 secret or charge from an asset you control to another asset controlled by an investigator at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost to play Stirring Up Trouble, add [Curse] tokens to the chaos bag equal to your location’s shroud value. Discover 2 clues at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent. Limit 1 Covenant per deck. ι When an investigator at your location reveals a [Curse] token during a skill test, exhaust Blasphemous Covenant: Treat that token’s modifier as +1 instead of its normal modifier. After this test ends, return that token to the chaos bag.

property.name: Text
property.value: Investigate. Add your ί value to your skill value for this investigation. If you succeed by 2 or more, you may automatically evade an enemy at this location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

property.name: Text
property.value: During this skill test, treat the modifier of each [Bless] and each [Curse] token as +1 instead of its normal modifier.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent. Limit 1 Covenant per deck.ι When an investigator at your location reveals a [Curse] token during a skill test, exhaust False Covenant: Cancel that chaos token, return it to the token pool, and reveal another token.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (3 charges). η Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses ά instead of ή and deals +1 damage. If a [Curse] token is revealed during this attack, you may deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location or place 1 charge on Armageddon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (3 charges). η Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using ά instead of έ. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If a [Curse] token is revealed during this investigation, you may discover 1 clue at a connecting location or place 1 charge on Eye of Chaos.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (3 charges). η Spend 1 charge: Evade. This evasion attempt uses ά instead of ί. If you succeed and the evaded enemy is non-Elite, you may move that enemy to a connecting location. If a [Curse] token is revealed during this evasion attempt, you may move to a connecting location or place 1 charge on Shroud of Shadows.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent. Limit 1 Covenant per deck. ι After an investigator at your location performs the “reveal chaos token” step of a skill test, if both a [Bless] token and a [Curse] token were revealed during that test, exhaust Paradoxical Covenant: This test automatically succeeds. (Remove each [Bless] and [Curse] token revealed from the chaos bag after this test ends.)

property.name: Text
property.value: η Exhaust Mariner’s Compass: Investigate. If you succeed and have no resources in your resource pool, discover 1 additional clue at your location. θ During an investigation using Mariner’s Compass, spend 1 resource: You get +1 έ for this skill test. (Limit three times per investigation.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent. Limit 1 Covenant per deck. ι When an investigator at your location resolves a [Bless] token during a skill test, exhaust Ancient Covenant: Do not reveal another token as part of this [Bless] token’s effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –1 for each location to the east of your location (on the same row). β: –2. If you fail, move to the connecting location to the east, ignoring all barriers. γ: –3. If you fail, choose a connecting location with no barriers between it and your location. Place 1 barrier between the two locations. δ: –X. X is the number of barriers between your location and all connecting locations.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –2 for each location to the east of your location (on the same row). β: –4. If you fail, move to the connecting location to the east, ignoring all barriers. γ: –5. If you fail, choose a connecting location with no barriers between it and your location. Place 1 barrier between the two locations. δ: –X. X is twice the number of barriers between your location and all connecting locations.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Suspect enemy loses aloof and cannot be parleyed with. Forced – When your turn ends, if you are at a fully flooded location: Take 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Increase the flood level of each Coastal location. Shuffle each set-aside Ravager from the Deep and Young Deep One enemy into the encounter deck, along with the encounter discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Suspect enemy loses aloof and cannot be parleyed with. Forced – When your turn ends, if you are at a fully flooded location: Take 1 damage and 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Increase the flood level of each Midtown location. Spawn the set-aside Angry Mob at Innsmouth Square. Randomly choose 1 of the set-aside facedown keys and place it on Angry Mob without looking at it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Suspect enemy loses aloof and cannot be parleyed with. Forced – When your turn ends, if you are at a fully flooded location: Take 1 damage, 1 horror, and discard 1 card at random from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Increase the flood level of each location. In player order, each investigator draws 1 encounter card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Suspect enemy loses aloof and cannot be parleyed with. Forced – When your turn ends, if you are at a fully flooded location: Take 1 damage, 1 horror, and discard 2 cards at random from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: In your Campaign Log, record Innsmouth was consumed by the rising tide. Each investigator that has not resigned is defeated and suffers 1 physical trauma.

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Spend 1π+1 clues, as a group: Remove 1 barrier between your location and a connecting location. Objective – Get to the Railroad Station! If each surviving investigator has resigned, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: In your Campaign Log, record the investigators made it safely to their vehicles. (→R1)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After this location is revealed: Randomly choose 1 of the set-aside facedown keys and place it on this location without looking at it. η η: Parley. Test έ (3). If you succeed, remove 1 barrier between this location and a connecting location.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Parley. Test ά (1π). If you succeed, remove 1 barrier between this location and a connecting location. θ If the investigators control 7 keys, as a group: Parley. Read Flashback VII in the Campaign Guide.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After this location is revealed: Randomly choose 1 of the set-aside facedown keys and place it on this location without looking at it. θ Take 1 damage: Parley. Remove 1 barrier between this location and a connecting location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After this location is revealed: Randomly choose 1 of the set-aside facedown keys and place it on this location without looking at it. θ Choose and discard 1 card from your hand: Parley. Remove 1 barrier between this location and a connecting location.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Spend 3 resources: Parley. Remove 1 barrier between this location and a connecting location. θ If you control the black key: Parley. Read Flashback VIII in the Campaign Guide.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After this location is revealed: Randomly choose 1 of the set-aside facedown keys and place it on this location without looking at it. η If there are no clues on this location: Parley. Remove 1 barrier between this location and a connecting location.

property.name: Text
property.value: η η Draw the top card of the encounter deck: Parley. Remove 1 barrier between this location and a connecting location. θ If the investigators control 5 or more keys, as a group: Parley. Read Flashback VI in the Campaign Guide.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fish Street Bridge gets +1 shroud for each barrier between it and any connecting location. η Add 2 [Curse] tokens to the chaos bag: Parley. Remove 1 barrier between this location and a connecting location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After you enter this location from a connecting location: Place 1 barrier between both locations. η: Parley. Test your lowest skill (2). If you succeed, remove 1 barrier between this location and a connecting location.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After you enter this location: Move to The House on Water Street. η η: Parley. Remove 1 barrier between this location and a connecting location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After this location is revealed: Spawn the set-aside Innsmouth Shoggoth at this location, exhausted. η: Parley. Move 1 barrier between this location and a connecting location so it is between this location and a different connecting location. θ If the investigators control 2 or more keys, as a group: Parley. Read Flashback V in the Campaign Guide.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After this location is revealed: Randomly choose 1 of the set-aside facedown keys and place it on this location without looking at it. η: Parley. Test ή (2) or ί (2). If you succeed, remove 1 barrier between this location and a connecting location.

property.name: Text
property.value: θ If you control 1 or more keys: Move to a connecting location. η Discard an asset you control: Parley. Remove 1 barrier between this location and a connecting location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After you enter this location, if it is flooded: Test ί (2). If you fail, take 1 damage. η: Resign. You escape the submerged town.

property.name: Text
property.value: Card effects cannot place barriers between Desolate Coastline and connecting locations.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Massive. Innsmouth Shoggoth gets +2π health. When Innsmouth Shoggoth moves via its hunter keyword, it ignores all barriers. Forced – After Innsmouth Shoggoth moves: Remove each barrier it moved through.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. While its location is flooded, Ravager from the Deep gets +1 fight and +1 evade (+2 fight and +2 evade instead if its location is fully flooded). Forced – After Ravager from the Deep engages you: Test ή (2). If you fail, place 1 barrier between your location and the connecting location to the west.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Revelation – Emerging Deep One enters play exhausted and unengaged unless its location is fully flooded. Forced – After Emerging Deep One engages you, if your location is flooded: It attacks you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. For each location to the east of your location (on the same row), discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a Deep One enemy with the hunter keyword is discarded and spawn that enemy at that location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Test ά (3). If you fail, move to the connecting location to the east, ignoring all barriers. Then place each key you control on your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Place 1 barrier between this location and each connecting location with no barriers between them. If no barriers are placed by this effect, Inundated gains surge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (3 tickets). Forced – When Joe Sargent leaves play: Remove him from the game. θ Spend 1 ticket: Move to a connecting location that is not fully flooded.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent. θ Exhaust Teachings of the Order and choose one effect you have not yet chosen this campaign: – Remove all [Curse] tokens from the chaos bag. – Remove a flood token from a non-Sanctum location. – Defeat a non-Elite enemy at your location.
